mapper.select: SELECT t2.sysName,t2.sysCode,t2.ststate,t2.createtime,t2.ID,t1.`value` type FROM(SELECT t1.`key`,t1.`value`,t1.sttime FROM ss_c_dic t1,( SELECT * FROM ss_c_dic WHERE `key` = 'subSystem' and ststate = 1 ) t2 WHERE t1.parentid = t2.id and t1.ststate = 1) t1 LEFT JOIN (select * from subsystem where ststate = 1) t2 ON t1.`key` = t2.type ORDER BY t1.sttime DESC,t2.createtime ASC
